job.title: Geospatial Data Analyst-US Citizen
job.description:
Description

Job Description:

Successful Candidates Will Possess The Following Minimum Required Skills

The Geospatial Data Analyst position directly supports key customer mission requirements for maritime safety of navigation. The position requires GIS skills to analyze, manipulate, convert, and transform geographic data into military specified compliance, while maintaining weekly and monthly milestone schedule requirements.
  • Strong maritime product knowledge and GIS background who can demonstrate effective throughput
  • Direct experience with Electronic Navigational Chart (ENC) and/or Digital Nautical Chart (DNC)
  • Esri ArcGIS software experience, to include updating geodatabases in ArcMap, managing data in ArcCatalog, utilizing Product Libraries, and various data editing toolbars
  • Keen attention to detail and rigorous organizational skills
  • Good communication, willingness to learn, and adaptive skills in order to coordinate & contribute in a team environment
  • Bachelors and 3+ years of professional GIS experience required or additional years of experience in lieu of degree
  • No clearance is required, but only those who are eligible to receive one should apply

Desired Skills
  • Experience with GIS data conversion and cross-product schema mapping would be a plus
  • SQL and Python experience would be a plus

Potential opportunity for telework.

External Referral Bonus

Ineligible

External Referral Bonus $:

Potential For Telework

Yes, 75%

Clearance Level Required

None
